definition[0]: to not have the chance to do something that you enjoy and that would be good for you
example[0]: Some children miss out because their parents can’t afford to pay for school trips.
example[1]: Prepare food in advance to ensure you don’t miss out on the fun!
definition[1]: to not include someone or something
example[2]: Make sure you don’t miss any details out.
explanation[0]: You use fail to when talking about not doing something that you should have done  Don't use miss in this meaning
example[3]: Some students failed to pay attention in class
